page.title: 15R.W.T.EDWORTHY & SONS,BOW
page.content: R.W.T.Edworthy & sons was started in 1945 with one lorry from a small cottage,now demolished,which forms the entrance to the present yard.They store and supply coal,building materials and ready mixed concrete. Coal is transported from the Midlands and also Exmouth and Teignmouth and delivered in bulk to coal merchants. They have 4 types of lorry all with C.B's,8 concrete,1 skip,3 chasesides, 2 forklifts and 16 tipper lorries (4 ten,7 twenty and 5 twenty five ton.)A staff of 29 are employed including 4 full time mechanics and a lady in the office working from 7.30am to 5.30pm. The office has a large Kalamazoo computer for wages,sales and bought ledger.R.Edworthy also rears bullocks and pigs.
